00010 #pragma once
00011 #include "FeatureCycles.h"
00012 #include "Addons.h"
00013 #include "StepNCTooling.h"

00015 
00016 
00017 class StepNCContourPocket : public   IWorkCycle
00018 {
00019 public:
00020   StepNCContourPocket(IWorkCycles * owner=NULL) ;
00021   virtual ~StepNCContourPocket(){}
00022   virtual HRESULT DeriveParameters(IStepNodePtr pExecutable, IStepNodePtr pFeature, IStepNodePtr pOpItem);
00023   virtual HRESULT LoadIntoStep();
00024   virtual HRESULT Create(IStepNodePtr, CString opname);
00025   virtual void InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems){}
00026   BEGIN_STEP_MAP(StepNCContourPocket)
00027 
00028     ENTRYSET(_T("Type"),        Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::String,    _T(""), _T("RectangularPocket"))
00029 
00030     // These build up the tree - these must be in the proper order
00031     ENTRY(_T("Feature"),        Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature"))   
00032     ENTRY(_T("Operation"),        Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_operation"))
00033     ENTRY(_T("SecurityPlane"),      Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_secplane/position"))
00034     ENTRY(_T("FeaturePlacement"),   Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_feature/feature_placement")) 
00035     ENTRY(_T("Depth"),          Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_feature/depth/position"))
00036     ENTRY(_T("MachiningStrategy"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_operation/its_machining_strategy"))
00037     ENTRY(_T("FeatureBoundary"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature/feature_boundary"))
00038     ENTRY(_T("BottomCondition"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature/bottom_condition"))
00039     // diameter/implicit_tolerance/  :: PLUS_MINUS_VALUE(0.100,0.100,3)
00040 
00041     ENTRY(_T("FeatureName"),      Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::String,    _T("its_id"))
00042     ENTRY(_T("ReferencePlane"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[2]"))
00043     ENTRY(_T("RetractPlane"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Position,  _T("retract_plane"))
00044     ENTRY(_T("SafetyPlane"),      Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Position,  _T("its_secplane/position/location/coordinates[2]"))
00045     ENTRY(_T("AbsDepth"),       Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("depth/position/location/coordinates[2]"))
00046 
00047     ENTRY(_T("CenterAbscissa"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[0]"))
00048     ENTRY(_T("CenterOrdinate"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[1]"))
00049     ENTRY(_T("StartAbscissa"),      Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[0]"))
00050     ENTRY(_T("StartOrdinate"),      Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[1]"))
00051     ENTRY(_T("PlacementRefDirection"),  Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/ref_direction/direction_ratios"))
00052     ENTRY(_T("Location"),       Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates"))
00053     ENTRY(_T("Axis"),         Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/axis/direction_ratios"))
00054     ENTRY(_T("ReferenceDirection"),   Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/ref_direction/direction_ratios"))
00055 
00056     ENTRY(_T("CornerRadius"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("orthogonal_radius/theoretical_size"))
00057     ENTRY(_T("PlanarRadius"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("planar_radius/theoretical_size"))
00058     ENTRY(_T("Slope"),          Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("slope"))
00059 
00060     ENTRY(_T("Contour"),        Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Polyline,  _T("feature_boundary{general_closed_profile}/closed_profile_shape{composite_curve}")) 
00061 
00062     ENTRY(_T("FinishAllowanceDepth"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("allowance_bottom"))
00063     ENTRY(_T("FinishAllowanceSide"),  Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("allowance_side"))
00064     ENTRY(_T("MaxOneInfeedDepth"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("axial_cutting_depth"))
00065     ENTRY(_T("Stepdown"),       Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("axial_cutting_depth"))
00066     ENTRY(_T("Stepover"),       Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("radial_cutting_depth"))
00067 
00068     ENTRY(_T("CutterComp"),       Cycle::Operation, Cycle::String,    _T("its_technology/feedrate_reference"))
00069     ENTRY(_T("InfeedFeedrate"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Feed,    _T("its_technology/feedrate"))
00070     ENTRY(_T("StepSpeed"),        Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Speed,   _T("its_technology/spindle"))
00071     ENTRY(_T("StepFeedrate"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Feed,    _T("its_technology/feedrate"))
00072 
00073     //project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[1]/its_operation/its_machine_functions/coolant/
00074     //project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[1]/its_operation/its_machine_functions/mist/
00075     //project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[1]/its_operation/its_machine_functions/chip_removal/
00076     ENTRY(_T("Angle"),          Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Angle,   _T("Angle = acos(Dot(Vector(1,0,0), PlacementRefDirection)) * 180.0 / M_PI;"))
00077     ENTRY(_T("CycleType"),        Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Long,    _T("CycleType = 1.0 + Find(Operation, \"finish\")") )
00078     LINK(StepNCTooling)
00079 
00080   END_STEP_MAP(StepNCContourPocket)
00081 
00082   BEGIN_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCContourPocket)
00083     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CutterComp != \"TCP\"") , _T(""))
00084     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Dwell < 0.0") , _T("DWELL_TIME_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGATIVE"))
00085     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("RetractPlane <= ReferencePlane") , _T(""))
00086     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("ReferencePlane <= AbsDepth") ,  _T(""))
00087     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Feedrate <= 0.0") ,  _T(""))
00088     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Speed <= 0.0") ,  _T(""))
00089     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Toollength < (ReferencePlane - AbsDepth)") ,  _T(""))
00090     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Overcut != 0.0") ,  _T("CENTER_DRILLING_MUST_NOT_HAVE_OVERCUT_LENGTH"))
00091     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CuttingDepth < 0.0") ,  _T("CUTTING_DEPTH_MUST_BE_POSITIVE"))
00092     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CuttingDepth > ( fabs(AbsDepth - ReferencePlane)") ,  _T("CUTTING_DEPTH_MUST_NOT_BE_GREATER_THAN_DEPTH"))
00093     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("RetractionFeedrate<=0.0") ,  _T("FEED_ON_RETRACE_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGATIVE_OR_TINY"))
00094     
00095   END_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCContourPocket)
00096   IStepNodePtr _project;
00097 };
00098 FEATURE_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(StepNCContourPocket);
00099 
00100 inline StepNCContourPocket::StepNCContourPocket(IWorkCycles * owner) :   IWorkCycle(owner)
00101 { 
00102   _parent=owner;
00103   InitStepItems(&items);
00104   InitTests(this);
00105 
00106 }
00107 inline HRESULT StepNCContourPocket::DeriveParameters(IStepNodePtr pExecutable, IStepNodePtr pFeature, IStepNodePtr pOpItem)
00108 {
00109   IWorkCycle::DeriveParameters(pExecutable, pFeature, pOpItem);
00110   CCannedCycleItems * items = GetStepMap();  // initialize output for now...  
00111 
00112   items->SetVariable(_T("CycleType"),  1) ;
00113 
00114   items->SetVariable(_T("Feedrate"), items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepFeedrate")) * 1000.0 * 60.0) ;
00115   items->SetVariable(_T("RetractionFeedrate"), items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepFeedrate")) * 1000.0 * 60.0) ;
00116   items->SetVariable(_T("SafetyPlane"), 2.0) ;
00117   items->SetVariable(_T("Speed"), fabs(items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepSpeed")))) ;
00118   items->SetVariable(_T("SpindleDir"), 3.0 + (items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepSpeed"))>=0)) ;
00119 
00120   // if tooling is wrong revise items list before calling this.
00121   //_toolnum= DeriveToolParameters( pFeature,  pOpItem);
00122 
00123 
00124   SanityCheck() ;
00125   debugstream << GetStepMap()->ToString();
00126   return S_OK;
00127 }
00128 
00129 inline HRESULT StepNCContourPocket::Create(IStepNodePtr project, CString opname)
00130 {
00131   if(project==NULL)
00132     return E_INVALIDARG;
00133 
00134   if(project->GetClassname() != _bstr_t(L"project"))
00135     throw std::exception("Bad Step project instance");
00136 
00137   INodeListPtr its_elements = project->GetAttributeNodeList(_bstr_t(L"/main_workplan/its_elements"));
00138   _pExecutable= its_elements->push_back(_bstr_t(L"machining_workingstep"), _bstr_t(L""));
00139   items.ClearDirtyFlags(); 
00140 
00141   return S_OK;
00142 }
00143 
00144 inline HRESULT StepNCContourPocket::LoadIntoStep() 
00145 { 
00146   CAddons addons(gProject);
00147   CCannedCycleItems * items = GetStepMap();  
00148   StepNCTooling tooling;
00149   tooling.DeriveParameters(items, _pExecutable); 
00150 
00151   IWorkCycle::LoadWSIntoStep(gProject);
00152 
00153   // FILL IN MISSING PARTS
00154 
00155   // FIXME: depth need to be turned into axis2d with proper orientation
00156   double depth = items->GetValue<double>(_T("AbsDepth"), -999.0);
00157   double securityPlane = items->GetValue<double>(_T("SecurityPlane"), -999.0);
00158   double startAbscissa = items->GetValue<double>(_T("StartAbscissa"), -999.0);
00159   double startOrdinate = items->GetValue<double>(_T("StartOrdinate"), -999.0);
00160   double referencePlane = items->GetValue<double>(_T("ReferencePlane"), -999.0);
00161   // Location orientation
00162 
00163   addons.DefineAxis2_placement_3d(_pFeature, _T("depth/position"), _T("depth"), Vector(0,0, depth).ToString(_T(",")));
00164   addons.DefineAxis2_placement_3d(_pExecutable, _T("its_secplane/position"), _T("security plane"), Vector(0,0, securityPlane).ToString(_T(",")));
00165   addons.DefineAxis2_placement_3d(_pExecutable, _T("its_feature/feature_placement"), _T("feature pos orientation"), Vector(startAbscissa, startOrdinate, referencePlane).ToString(_T(",")));
00166 
00167   // FIXME: location need to be turned into axis2d
00168 
00169   // Angle will have to be added as a  simplifying concept
00170   // Angle = acos(Dot(Vector(1,0,0), PlacementRefDirection)) * 180.0 / M_PI;
00171   if(items->IsDirty(_T("Angle")))
00172   {
00173     double a = items->GetValue<double>(_T("Angle")) * M_PI/180.0 ;
00174     // translate into step 
00175     Vector v   = Vector(1,0,0) * RotateZ(a) ;
00176     items->SetVariable(_T("ReferenceDirection"), (Vector) v) ;
00177 
00178   }
00179   if(items->IsDirty(_T("CCW")))
00180   {
00181     double ccw = (items->GetValue<long>(_T("CCW")) > 0) ? -1 : 1;
00182     items->SetVariable(_T("StepSpeed"), ccw * items->GetValue<double>(_T("Speed"))) ;  
00183 
00184   }
00185   if(!items->IsDirty(_T("Cutmode")))
00186   {
00187     items->SetVariable(_T("Cutmode"), (LPCTSTR) _T(".climb."));
00188     // project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[3]/its_operation/its_machining_strategy/*/cutmode
00189   }
00190   if(items->IsDirty(_T("CycleType")))
00191   {
00192     long n = items->GetValue<long>(_T("CycleType"), 1);
00193     if(n==1)
00194     {
00195       items->SetVariable(_T("Operation"), _T("bottom_and_side_rough_milling")) ;  
00196     }
00197     else
00198     {
00199       items->SetVariable(_T("Operation"), _T("bottom_and_side_finish_milling")) ;  
00200 
00201     }
00202 
00203   } 
00204 
00205   return S_OK; 
00206 }
